short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automation of work with Bandcamp: tempo adjustment, preserve pitch, playback control by hotkeys, autoplay, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Introducing Bandcamp Play, the extension designed exclusively for Bandcamp. With its integrated features and automation, your music browsing and listening experiences are enhanced.

⚙️ FEATURES:
📍 Autoplay: Effortlessly enjoy your own or others' collections, wishlists, and feeds without interruptions
📍 Playback Hotkeys:
        ▪️​ Spacebar: play/pause
        ▪️​ ⬅️ or ➡️ - move Track playback back or forward on a configured count of seconds
        ▪️​ 0️⃣ to 9️⃣ - move Track playback on 0, 10, 20 ... 90%
        ▪️​ ⬆️​ or ⬇️ - increase or decrease the Track playback speed​
        ▪️​ Shift + ⬇️ - reset the Track playback speed​
        ▪️ 'P' - enable Auto-Pitch (useful when the speed of the track has changed a lot)
        ▪️​ Shift + 'P' - reset Auto-Pitch​
📍 Playlist Hotkeys:
        ▪️​ 'N' - play the next Track from the beginning
        ▪️​ 'B' - play the previous Track from the beginning
        ▪️​ Shift + 1️⃣ to 9️⃣ - play Track by index
📍 Additional Hotkeys:
        ▪️​ 'O' - open Album or Track in a new tab
        ▪️​ Shift + 'O' - open Album or Track in a new tab and focus on it
        ▪️​ 'L' - Add or remove an item from the Wishlist collection
NOTE: All shortcuts are editable (click on the extension icon to open the menu).
📍 Auto-click the 'View All Items' Button: Automatically navigate through any collection by clicking the 'View All Items' button.

🌈 WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:

▪️​ Your experience is important to us. If you encounter any bugs or have innovative ideas for new features, please create an issue on our GitHub page (https://github.com/borbiuk/band-play). Some functionality has already been added based on your recommendations 🙏🤝.

👮 PRIVACY:

▪️ We do NOT send or store your data anywhere.
▪️​ Permissions are required for the extension to function.
▪️​ The extension code is open source.
